documents.text:
DonJed Energy Solutions - Product Catalog

Solar Panel Systems:
- 3kW Residential System: ₦1,800,000 - ₦2,200,000
- 5kW Residential System: ₦2,500,000 - ₦3,500,000
- 7.5kW Commercial System: ₦4,000,000 - ₦5,500,000
- 10kW Commercial System: ₦6,000,000 - ₦8,000,000

All systems include:
- High-efficiency solar panels (Tier 1 manufacturers)
- Hybrid inverters with MPPT technology
- Deep cycle batteries (Lithium or AGM options)
- Professional installation and commissioning
- 10-year warranty on panels, 5-year on inverters
- Free maintenance for first year

Solar Panel Specifications:

Our solar panels are sourced from top-tier manufacturers including:
- Monocrystalline panels: 400W - 550W per panel
- Efficiency rating: 20-22%
- Temperature coefficient: -0.35%/°C
- 25-year performance warranty
- Anti-reflective coating for maximum light absorption
- Corrosion-resistant aluminum frame

Inverter Options:
- 3kW - 10kW hybrid inverters
- Pure sine wave output
- Built-in MPPT charge controllers
- Grid-tie and off-grid capabilities
- Remote monitoring via mobile app
- Surge protection and overload protection

Battery Storage Solutions:

Lithium-Ion Batteries:
- 5kWh - 20kWh capacity options
- 6000+ cycle life
- 95% depth of discharge
- 10-year warranty
- Compact and lightweight design
- Price: ₦800,000 - ₦3,200,000

AGM Deep Cycle Batteries:
- 200Ah - 400Ah capacity
- 3-5 year lifespan
- Maintenance-free
- More affordable option
- Price: ₦150,000 - ₦400,000 per unit

Battery Management System (BMS) included with all lithium batteries for optimal performance and safety.

DonJed Solar Installation Guide

System Sizing Guidelines:

To determine the right solar system size for your needs:

1. Calculate your daily energy consumption:
   - List all appliances and their wattage
   - Multiply by hours of daily use
   - Add 20% buffer for inefficiencies

2. Common household loads:
   - Air conditioner (1.5HP): 1,500W x 8 hours = 12kWh
   - Refrigerator: 150W x 24 hours = 3.6kWh
   - Lighting (10 bulbs): 200W x 6 hours = 1.2kWh
   - TV and electronics: 300W x 6 hours = 1.8kWh
   - Total example: ~19kWh per day

3. Recommended system size:
   - For 15-20kWh daily: 5kW system
   - For 25-35kWh daily: 7.5kW system
   - For 40-50kWh daily: 10kW system

Solar Panel Performance in Different Weather:

Sunny Days:
- Optimal performance at 100% capacity
- Peak production between 10 AM - 3 PM
- Can generate 5-6 hours of peak sunlight equivalent

Cloudy/Rainy Days:
- Panels still generate 10-25% of normal capacity
- Diffused sunlight is still usable
- Battery backup ensures continuous power

Harmattan Season:
- Dust accumulation can reduce efficiency by 5-10%
- Regular cleaning recommended
- Still maintains 85-90% performance

Night Time:
- No solar generation
- System runs on battery power
- Automatic switching to stored energy

Battery backup typically provides 1-3 days of autonomy depending on system size and usage.

Installation Process:

1. Site Assessment (Day 1):
   - Roof inspection and structural analysis
   - Shading analysis
   - Electrical system evaluation
   - Load calculation

2. System Design (2-3 days):
   - Custom system configuration
   - Component selection
   - Wiring diagram preparation
   - Permit applications if required

3. Installation (2-5 days):
   - Mounting structure installation
   - Solar panel installation
   - Inverter and battery setup
   - Electrical connections
   - System testing and commissioning

4. Training and Handover:
   - System operation training
   - Monitoring app setup
   - Maintenance guidelines
   - Warranty documentation

Total installation time: 5-10 working days from site assessment to final handover.

Maintenance and Care:

Monthly Maintenance:
- Visual inspection of panels for damage or debris
- Check battery water levels (for flooded batteries)
- Monitor system performance via app
- Clean panels if dusty or dirty

Quarterly Maintenance:
- Tighten all electrical connections
- Inspect mounting hardware
- Check inverter ventilation
- Review energy production data

Annual Professional Service:
- Comprehensive system inspection
- Thermal imaging of panels
- Battery health assessment
- Inverter firmware updates
- Performance optimization

Cleaning Tips:
- Use soft brush or cloth with water
- Clean early morning or evening
- Avoid abrasive materials
- Professional cleaning available

Warranty covers all manufacturing defects. Regular maintenance ensures optimal performance and longevity.

DonJed Energy Solutions - Customer Audit Questionnaire

Property Information:
1. What type of property do you have?
   - Residential (Bungalow/Duplex/Apartment)
   - Commercial (Office/Shop/Warehouse)
   - Industrial

2. What is your roof type?
   - Concrete flat roof
   - Metal/Aluminum roofing
   - Asbestos roofing
   - Tile roofing

3. Approximate roof area available for solar panels:
   - Less than 20 square meters
   - 20-50 square meters
   - 50-100 square meters
   - More than 100 square meters

4. Is there significant shading on your roof?
   - No shading
   - Partial shading (trees, nearby buildings)
   - Heavy shading

Energy Consumption Assessment:

1. What is your average monthly electricity bill?
   - Less than ₦20,000
   - ₦20,000 - ₦50,000
   - ₦50,000 - ₦100,000
   - More than ₦100,000

2. Major appliances you want to power:
   □ Air conditioners (How many? ___)
   □ Refrigerator/Freezer
   □ Water heater
   □ Washing machine
   □ Electric stove/oven
   □ Microwave
   □ TV and entertainment systems
   □ Computers and office equipment
   □ Lighting
   □ Security systems
   □ Water pumps

3. What are your peak usage hours?
   - Morning (6 AM - 12 PM)
   - Afternoon (12 PM - 6 PM)
   - Evening (6 PM - 12 AM)
   - Night (12 AM - 6 AM)

4. Do you experience frequent power outages?
   - Rarely (less than 2 hours/day)
   - Moderate (2-8 hours/day)
   - Frequent (8-16 hours/day)
   - Severe (more than 16 hours/day)

System Preferences:

1. What type of solar system are you interested in?
   - Grid-tied (connected to utility grid)
   - Off-grid (completely independent)
   - Hybrid (both grid and battery backup)

2. Battery backup requirements:
   - No backup needed (grid-tied only)
   - 4-8 hours backup
   - 12-24 hours backup
   - 2-3 days backup

3. Budget range:
   - Under ₦2,000,000
   - ₦2,000,000 - ₦4,000,000
   - ₦4,000,000 - ₦6,000,000
   - Above ₦6,000,000

4. Financing options interest:
   - Full payment upfront
   - Installment payment (3-6 months)
   - Financing through partner banks

5. Timeline for installation:
   - Immediate (within 1 month)
   - 1-3 months
   - 3-6 months
   - Just exploring options

Additional Services:

1. Are you interested in energy-efficient appliances?
   - Yes, please provide recommendations
   - No, I have my appliances

2. Do you need electrical wiring upgrades?
   - Yes, my wiring is old
   - No, wiring is recent
   - Not sure, please assess

3. Monitoring and maintenance preferences:
   - Remote monitoring with mobile app
   - Annual maintenance contract
   - Training for self-maintenance
   - Full service package

4. How did you hear about DonJed Energy Solutions?
   - Referral from friend/family
   - Online search
   - Social media
   - Advertisement
   - Previous customer

Contact Information:
Name: _______________
Phone: _______________
Email: _______________
Address: _______________
Best time to contact: _______________

Thank you for choosing DonJed Energy Solutions. Our team will contact you within 24-48 hours to discuss your solar energy needs.
